body:
Yes, I am humblebragging. I was exhilarated, honestly.

Just wanted to say!

- caleb_gl (formerly djsmiley).

title: New achievement for me: 5 Mons in Quintus.

replies.body:
Gratz :P
Did you get them all at once or dying in-between the monuments?

replies.body:
Hey Caleb! Congratulations on your achievement, however these posts are frowned upon. "Discussions surrounding personal updates is frowned upon as they are meant to be inclusive rather than oriented around a single person. Punishments for this will only be distributed in the event that a user continually uses the discussions for this purpose alone."
